Title: The Sound of Magic
Writer: Christopher Broe, Garrett Lander, Basil Mironer, Eugene Mironer (story)
Actors: Ben Felix Mironer, Alison Woods, Daniel David Stewart, Kevin P. Farley
Plot: Bart Bagelszby is tired of being ignored by the girl of his dreams. Now, he has a master plan that will transform himself and his awkward group of friends, from choir nerds to rock gods. ...
